data.question: What is the purpose of using a Quantum Design 7 Tesla SQUID-VSM system?
What is the role of the modulation amplitude in ESR spectra recording?
data.answer: It is a parameter set during the recording of ESR spectra, specifically set to 0.4 G in this work.

data.question: Why was DSC performed under N2 gas?
data.answer: To prevent oxidation or other reactions that could occur if the sample were exposed to air during the thermal analysis.

data.question: Is the magnetic behavior of sample 3 more like superparamagnetism or ferromagnetism?
True or False: The total pore volume of sample 2 was calculated using the ASiQwin software.
What was the estimated critical temperature for the magnetic ordering of material 2?
What method was used for the high-temperature part fitting of the temperature-dependent 1/χM of sample 1?
True or False: The Brillouin function was used to fit M(H) curves at 2 K for samples 2 and 3.
What was the purpose of sealing the powder sample in a plastic capsule?
data.answer: To prevent contamination and ensure accurate magnetic susceptibility measurements.

data.question: True or False: The magnetic susceptibility was measured with an applied field of either 10 Oe or 1000 Oe.
What was the modulation frequency set for the ESR spectra recording?
True or False: The magnetic saturation of the ferromagnetic component for sample 2 was fitted using the Brillouin function.
What was the microwave power setting for the ESR spectra recording?
Why was the sample activated and outgassed at 120 ºC before gas sorption measurements?
data.answer: To remove any adsorbed substances or moisture that could interfere with accurate measurement of gas sorption.

data.question: True or False: The X-ray intensity data of [CN6CP]K (1a) were measured using a four circles goniometer Kappa geometry.
What was the purpose of using a Soxhlet extractor with acetonitrile for the samples?
data.answer: To extract the samples thoroughly before activation and outgassing, ensuring they are clean for accurate gas sorption measurements.

data.question: True or False: The shortest distance between C of the cation [N(CH3)4]+ and N of the anion [CN6CP]·− in the crystal structure of [CN6CP][Me4N] is 3.56 Å.
What was the scan rate for the DSC performed on the samples?
True or False: The magnetic susceptibility measurements were conducted over a temperature range of 2 to 380 K.
Why was the data corrected for diamagnetic contribution from sample holders and samples themselves?
data.answer: To ensure accurate magnetic measurements by removing the influence of diamagnetic materials that do not contribute to the magnetic properties being studied.
